bibl.title: Four Unpublished Demotic Ostraca from the Reign of Augustus.
bibl.note: O. Cair. Inv. SR 18953: 1. DO. Cairo 273. Receipt for the poll-tax. Thebes, 22-21 B.C.; - 2. DO. Cairo 240. Receipt for the nḥb tax. Thebes, 9 Apr. A.D. 1; - 3. DO. Cairo 279. Receipt for the nḥb tax. Thebes, 19 Aug. A.D. 5; - 4. DO. Cairo 268. Receipt for the poll-tax and bath-tax. Thebes, 21 Jul. A.D. 13.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie Copte
